reasoning_log: The dataset contained 17 descriptions and 18 images, including several duplicates or multiple views of the same room. The matching strategy focused on identifying unique features mentioned in the descriptions (e.g., '內建開放書架' for Desc_12, '乾濕不分離' for Desc_11, '與衛浴相連' for Desc_7, and specific views of the living room/master suite). Images 1, 2, and 14 were assigned to the three living room descriptions based on the specific features highlighted (storage/finish, open layout, and TV wall, respectively). Images 4, 8, and 16, which depict the same bar area, were differentiated by the angle and emphasis (atmosphere, connection, concentrated lighting). The four master bedroom descriptions (Desc_6, 9, 10, 16) were matched to the four distinct views of the primary master suite (Images 6, 9, 10, 17) based on the spatial focus (flow, comfort, scale, storage wall). Image 15 was identified as a duplicate of Image 1 and is the redundant image.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing large windows (採光佳), extensive wood paneling/shelving (收納充足), and modern grey tile flooring (地板好清潔).
Living room view emphasizing the connection to the dining/bar area (開放餐廳客廳) and the overall flow (生活動線順暢). Lighting is uniform but not overly bright (採光一般).
Independent galley kitchen (獨立廚房空間) with a long countertop (作業檯面長) and extensive white cabinetry (收納非常充足).
Bar area featuring a large island (中島餐桌設計) and display cabinets (展示收納櫃). This view is similar to Image 8 but emphasizes the structure.
Spacious, empty multi-function room (空間寬敞) with a built-in storage niche/bookshelf (收納潛力高) and a relatively small window (採光一般).
Master bedroom view highlighting the large scale (主臥尺度大) and the long entry/walkway, suggesting space for an independent rest area.
Dressing area with a vanity (化妝檯設計), glass wardrobe (收納分區明確), and a clear connection/doorway leading directly to the bathroom (與衛浴相連).
Bar area showing the island, high chairs, and the decorative chandelier (燈光設計感強), emphasizing the atmosphere (展示櫃氣氛佳).
Close-up view of the master bed area, highlighting the soft lighting (燈光柔和) and comfortable setup (舒適睡眠空間).
Wide view of the master bedroom showing the large space and the wide aisle between the bed and the window/wall (動線順暢), confirming the large spatial sense (主臥空間感大).
Bathroom featuring a wood ceiling (木作天花) and no physical barrier between the shower and the rest of the room (乾濕不分離).
Secondary bedroom with a built-in open bookshelf (內建開放書架) next to the window.
Bathroom featuring a glass partition separating the shower area (乾濕分離佳) and a wood ceiling.
Living room view focusing on the large, modern wall reserved for the television (電視主牆預留) and the overall large space (大客廳空間).
Bar area view showing the island and the concentrated lighting fixture above it (燈光集中).
Master bedroom view focusing on the wall opposite the bed, which features built-in shelving/storage (主臥收納牆).
Empty, square room (空間方正) with a large window/sliding door providing excellent natural light (採光佳).
